fathom.comment: Fathom MCP - Add user behavior insights to requirements
usage: Get API key from your Fathom Analytics dashboard
Then ask Claude: 'Analyze our user behavior from Fathom and add insights to docs/requirements.md'
Or: 'What are our top user flows? Add them to docs/requirements.md'
Or: 'Which features get the most usage? Update docs/requirements.md priorities'
